<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Start the backup"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/portal/startbackup"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Starts the backup of the current portal with the parameters specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"storageType":{"description":"Storage type (\"Documents\", \"ThridpartyDocuments\", \"CustomCloud\", \"Local\", \"DataStore\", or \"ThirdPartyConsumer\")","type":"integer"},"storageParams":{"description":"Storage parameters","type":"array","items":{"type":"object"}},"backupMail":{"description":"Specifies if the mails will be included into the backup or not","type":"boolean"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Backup progress","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"IsCompleted":{"type":"boolean","example":"false"},"Progress":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"44"},"Error":{"type":"string","example":"null"},"Link":{"type":"string","example":"Link"}},"title":"BackupProgress"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
